name: PLAY Token
description: The PLAY token is a digital payment method used within the WEMIX PLAY platform, issued only when an actual payment transaction is made via WEMIX Pay. The token provides real utility within the WEMIX ecosystem, enabling users to acquire in-game items, NFTs, and other digital assets. Additionally, PLAY token holders can access specific game tokens early, allowing them to participate in the early stages of game development.
